trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemCommand"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gir dataene for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemCommand"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemCommand> event is raised when a button in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemCommand>denne hendelsen oppstår når en knapp i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>kontrollen klikkes.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemCommand>

trans-unit.source: This enables you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør at du må oppgi en hendelseshåndtering metode som utfører en egendefinert rutine når denne hendelsen oppstår.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control also raises other events when certain buttons are clicked (for example, buttons with the `CommandName` property set to "Delete", "Update", or "Page").
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>kontrollen opphøyer også andre hendelser når du enkelte knapper er (for eksempel knapper med den `CommandName` egenskapen satt til "Delete", "Oppdatering" eller "Side").</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>

trans-unit.source: When you use one of these buttons, you can handle one of the specialized events that are provided by the control, such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemDeleted> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemDeleting> events.
trans-unit.target: Når du bruker en av disse knappene, kan du behandle én av spesialiserte hendelser som tilbys av kontrollen, for eksempel den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemDeleted>eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemDeleting>hendelser.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemDeleting> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemDeleted>

trans-unit.source: A ListViewCommandEventArgs object is passed to the event-handling method, which enables you to determine the command name and command argument of the button that was clicked.
trans-unit.target: En ListViewCommandEventArgs-objekt er sendt til hendelseshåndtering metoden, slik at du kan finne kommandonavnet og kommando-argument for knappen som ble klikket.

trans-unit.source: To determine the command name use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A> property, and to determine the command argument, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Ikke fastsette kommandoen navnet bruk av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A>egenskapen og for å fastslå Kommandoargumentet, bruker den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also access the button control that raised the event by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewCommandEventArgs.CommandSource%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også gå knappekontrollen hendelsen ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewCommandEventArgs.CommandSource%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewCommandEventArgs.CommandSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of the ListViewCommandEventArgs class, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewCommandEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: En liste med opprinnelige verdier for en forekomst av klassen ListViewCommandEventArgs, kan du se den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewCommandEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>konstruktør.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewCommandEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewCommandEventArgs"></xref> class by using the specified source of the command and event arguments.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewCommandEventArgs"> </xref> klassen ved hjelp av den angitte kilden til argumenter for kommandoen og arrangementer.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewCommandEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne konstruktøren til å initialisere en ny forekomst av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewCommandEventArgs>klassen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewCommandEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This constructor is primarily used by control developers when they raise events.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Denne konstruktøren brukes hovedsakelig av kontrollutviklere når de heve hendelser.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewCommandEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser første egenskapsverdier for en forekomst av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewCommandEventArgs>klassen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewCommandEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A>|The value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs> object that is contained in the `originalArgs` parameter.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A>|The value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs> object that is contained in the `originalArgs` parameter.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCommandEventArgs.CommandSource%2A>|The object that is contained in the `commandSource` parameter.|
trans-unit.target: | Egenskapen | Standardverdi | |--------------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A>| Verdien for egenskapen <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A>for <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs>-objektet som ligger i den `originalArgs` parameteren. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A>| Verdien for egenskapen <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A>for <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs>-objektet som ligger i den `originalArgs` parameteren. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCommandEventArgs.CommandSource%2A>| Objektet som ligger i den `commandSource` parameteren. |</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewCommandEventArgs.CommandSource%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A>

trans-unit.source: The item from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"></xref> control for which the command was issued.
trans-unit.target: Elementet fra den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"> </xref> kontrollere for kommandoen ble utstedt.

trans-unit.source: The source of the command.
trans-unit.target: Kilden for kommandoen.

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsesdata.

trans-unit.source: Gets the source of the command.
trans-unit.target: Henter kilden for kommandoen.

trans-unit.source: Use the CommandSource property to access the properties of the object that represents the source of the command.
trans-unit.target: Bruk CommandSource-egenskapen for å få tilgang til egenskapene for objektet som representerer kilden for kommandoen.

trans-unit.source: For the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewCommandEventArgs> object, the source of the command is the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control that contains the button clicked by the user.
trans-unit.target: For den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewCommandEventArgs>objektet, kilden for kommandoen er den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>kontrollen som inneholder knappen klikkes av brukeren.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewCommandEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The source of the command.
trans-unit.target: Kilden for kommandoen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the control has handled the event.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om kontrollen har behandlet hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: Set this property to `true` in the event handler to specify that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control should not handle the event because you are handling it in your code.
trans-unit.target: Sett denne egenskapen til `true` i hendelsesbehandlingen til å angi at den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>kontrollen kan ikke behandle hendelsen fordi du arbeider i koden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if data-bound event code was skipped or has finished; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis databundet hendelseskode ble hoppet over eller er avsluttet. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the data item for which the command was issued.
trans-unit.target: Henter dataelementet som kommandoen ble utstedt.

trans-unit.source: The data item from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"></xref> control for which the command was issued.
trans-unit.target: Dataelement fra den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView"> </xref> kontrollere for kommandoen ble utstedt.
